Content: Colombo  (News 1st) – According to the Police they have received 2 complaints regarding the postal voting process. Police Spokesperson SSP Ruwan Gunasekara noted that they received the complaints from Kebithigollawa and Gampola. Postal voting for the Presidential election took place yesterday and on Thursday (Oct 31st). State sector officials in the Police, elections offices and district secretariats will receive a chance to cast their postal votes on Monday (Nov 4) and Tuesday. SSP Ruwan Gunasekara also added that a total of 38 individuals have been arrested by the Police in relation to election-related activities.
